issue_name: Weak Encryption Vulnerability in SIPROTEC 5 Devices

1.command: Update to V9.64 or later version
1.description: Update SIPROTEC 5 Compact 7SX800 (CP050) to V9.64 or later version.

43.description: Update SIPROTEC 5 Communication Module ETH-BD-2FO to V9.62 or later version.

44.command: Restrict access to port 443/tcp, 4443/tcp, and configurable port for syslog over TLS
44.description: Restrict access to port 443/tcp for web, 4443/tcp for DIGSI 5, and configurable port for syslog over TLS to trusted IP addresses only.
